title: commander keen 4 challenge
content:
here's my challenge idea(i chose 4 because all the keen fans can get this one without trouble in like 2 minutes and like it the most of the free ones [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] ).
the challenge consists of getting all the items(so doing all the levels including temple of forbidden) no dying difficulty settings at hard only saving no deaths at the map no altered levels and probably the most important of all NO CHEATS.
i Know it wil be harder then a regular hard mode but thats why its a challenge.
I tried it my self but failed that fish like enemy(forgotten its name) stole my items before i could get them [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] .
to keep track of who is the best lets use times needed to finish this challenge.
how is this idea of a challenge?This is not real.
You did not see this.
You werent here.

title: Re: commander keen 4 challenge
content: Nice idea, but I'm terribly bad with those red-fishlike things (can't remember their names either), they steal my stuff most of times. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] I don't have the energy to try it right now, sorry.. :sleepYou hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: commander keen 4 challenge
content:
thats the only enemy that gave me trouble i think others wil say that dopefishes are the hardest but i think they then don't use this little trick swim trough them after feeding them a schoolfish [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img] . thats how i got past the dopefish in the wel of wishes but they almost had me [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-annoyed.gif[/img]:"> .
This is not real.
You did not see this.
You werent here.

title: Re: commander keen 4 challenge
content:
What is meant by "no dying difficulty" and "saving no deaths at the map"?
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-confused.gif[/img]

And I think the red fish-like guys are called Gnosticene Ancients; they're such thieves -- I once caught one stealing a keygem! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img]

title: Re: commander keen 4 challenge
content:
"no dying difficulty" means nothing i have forgotten to ad a , before difficulty.
and "saving no deaths only at the map" means you can only save at the map but not if you died maybe i was a little to cryptic there [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-embarrassed.gif[/img] .This is not real.
You did not see this.
You werent here.

title: Re: commander keen 4 challenge
content:
Those ancients can be shot at the start of the level, but you have to time your approach nearly pixel-perfect if you are to get the extra lives.------------------------------------------------------
Keep in mind, I'm not an artist.

"Take evasive action!"

title: Good luck...
content: You can try, but if you're honestly going to go through the Pyramid of the Forbidden in hard mode, getting every single point, you're NUTS.

title: Re: Good luck...
content:
It's actually quite a lot harder to go through the game getting as FEW items as possible. And worse if you try to avoid shooting enemies. On Hard.

Which I've done. >_>

title: Re: Good luck...
content: Yeah, I believe it's impossible to get all the stuff in the Pyramid of the Gnosticene Ancients.  There's one life that is (probably) just meant to tempt Keen because a fishman always grabs it instead.

title: Re: Good luck...
content:
well it eint imposible to get all the items in piramid Gnosticene i pulled it of twice getting all the items there (in easy and medium) and i managed to solve the piramid of forbidden without chats AND all the items in hard once maybe twice but to do that i sorta abused the imposible pogo trick oh i also pogod on those spicke things to get high enough to get some items and thats something thats very hard.(you need even better timing then those red fishes for that.)This is not real.
You did not see this.

title: huh?
content: You must have really done things the hard way, then... ;-)  The only thing you should have to abuse in Keen4 is Save-Reload... most of the jumps aren't so hard as the enemies loving to stand in the worst places possible.

title: Re: huh?
content: I'd take out "get all points"[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] bp ate the dopefish!

title: Re: huh?
content:
that would make it a lot easyer and i already survived keen 4 without dying and cheats and only saving at the map with dificulty hard about 3 or 4 times(temple of forbidden included) but you could first practice that way and then do the challenge.
i hope some actually do the challenge so i get the first times.This is not real.

title: Re: huh?
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Merder:
well it eint imposible to get all the items in piramid Gnosticene i pulled it of twice getting all the items there (in easy and medium)[hr][/quote]
What version of Keen 4 do you have, merder? Maybe it's different from the ones I've seen because there's one life in the pyramid of the Gnosticene Ancients that I know no way of getting. It's on a little indention in the wall straight above Keen when you first enter the level (you can use jump-cheat to get to it quickly [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] )

title: Re: huh?
content:

title: Re: huh?
content:
i have the one from [url=http://www.dosgames.com]dosgames.com[/url] though hard to do that one up is get able with the impossible pogo trick though timing must be almost pixel perfect. i even saw i video of someone who did it somewhere on the net though that one might be a fake video. i heard also of other ways of getting it without cheats.This is not real.

title: humn...
content: If you're getting ALL the points/items on a level without saving mid-level, on Hard... I would love to see a video / record of how many times you died trying to get the two extra lives above the Mad Mushroom in the Perilous Pit.  Those are damn hard to get.

title: *feels unkeenish*
content: Hmm? What two points above the mad mushroom in the Perilous Pit? I never knew about those ...

title: yep
content: Oh, yeah... down in the lower left of the level, where the Lick is, there's a Mad Mushroom whose head bobs just into the ceiling.  If you manage a pogo up above him, there's 2 extra lives; but you'll die almost every time you do it.  It's possible to snag them and survive, but it's VERY difficult.

title: Re: huh?
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Levellord00:
Most people only think you can't get at it, but you can. [hr][/quote]

Ok, this is something I've never known about. Could someone explain to me how to get that extra life? How can Keen grab something in an area with the ceiling only one block above the ground (and Keen is two blocks tall)? [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-stunned.gif[/img]

title: hmm
content: I'd imagine grabbing the edge would be enough...?  If not, grabbing the edge and attempting to pull yourself up...[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/posted-pics/XkyRauhKeenLogo.png[/img]
